Maps extra attributes and methods onto this model for use later, mostly in Falcon views. Will ensure that any method that is not a knockout observable will be called in the context of this model as well as pass this model in as the first argument, pushing the other arguments down the list.

mapping
The mapping to augment this model with
var Dog = Falcon.Model.extend({ defaults: { "name": "Fido" } }); var dog = new Dog(); console.log( ko.isObservable( dog.name ) ); // => false console.log( dog.bark instanceof Function ); // => false dog.mixin({ "name": ko.observable(), "bark": function() { console.log( this.get("name") + " says woof!"); } }); console.log( ko.isObservable( dog.name ) ); // => true console.log( dog.bark instanceof Function ); // => true dog.bark() // => Fido says woof!
